page.title: 04Unusual Employment
page.content: One of our parents works at the town hall in the High Street.His uniform is navy{blue.} He wears trousers and a navy jacket and black shiny shoes with a{blue}shirt and tie.He has two badges.Once a year he has to get ready for the{Oyster Feast for celebrities.} He has to check there is the right number of tables and chairs. In the town hall are the juvenile courts. There are meetings with members of the council. They decide on new rules and lots other information. When the Queen visits the town hall he has to clean and polish the floors and lay the red carpet out.He says he has to do a lot to help the mayor like taking him cups of tea and cleaning his parlour. He has known the town hall for twelve years and worked there for four years.
